taskDescription: Monoalkylated and dialkylated acetic acids can be prepared by malonic ester synthesis, but trialkylated acetic acids (R3C–CO2H) can’t be prepared. Explain.
detailedSolution: Malonic ester has only two acidic hydrogens to be replaced.
